output #{2,4,6}
output #(3d6)
output #3d6

output 1@{2,4,6}
output 3@{2, 4, 6}
output {1,3}@{2,4,6}
output {1,2,2}@{2,4,6}

output 1@3d6
output 3@3d6
output {1,2}@3d6

output 1@246
output {1..3}@246

\\\ Result \\\
